title: FS: T207 Lot w/ Several Tough Commons - **PRICE DROP**

posts.post_title: FS: T207 Lot w/ Several Tough Commons - **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T207 cards available.  Several VERY tough commons in this lot, as anybody who is working on this set can attest.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] or send me a PM to reserve any cards or with questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (take the entire remaining lot for $300 delivered):

Almeida (SGC 10, tough Broadleaf/Cycle class card w/scarce Anonymous back) - $85
Coulson - $18
Engle (maybe toughest Recruit class card in the set) - **SOLD**
Ferry - $14
Fromme - **SOLD**
George - $40
M. Mitchell (Cincinnati), PSA 1.5 - $45
Mullin (no "D" on cap) - $25
Stanage - **SOLD*
Strunk - $14
Bump for a price drop on remaining cards

Hey Marc,

I got the cards you shipped me recently. They look good.  Thanks as always for the great service!
